title: Problems Installing
body: I had to completely wipe my computer and download all of my games again, but League of Legends has had problems. I have encountered multiple pauses it Parts 1 and 2, and eventually it gets to 57% and pauses permanently. I was hoping someone here could help with this problem as I really wish to play.

replies.body:
When you say that it pauses permanently at 57%, does anything appear such as an error message?  What does the patcher say exactly, or does it get stuck at 0kbps download?  

Reply back and let me know!

Surprisingly, I got it to finally work after a day+

Though I believe it was trying to apply the patch, where it doesn't give any kbps. There may be some confusion on my own end as to whether or not that is the installation or not, but it did freeze. No error message or anything, it just stopped patching entirely at the time it occurred.
